00068 // memory alloc type define
00069 #define KOS_MEM_FREE                        0x0000
00070 // memory not allocated
00071 #define KOS_MEM_GLOBAL                      0x1000
00072 // global memory type
00073 #define KOS_MEM_LOCAL                       0x2000
00074 // local (task) memory type
00075 #define KOS_MEM_HEAP0                       0x0100
00076 // heap number
